an10.179:3.1: 135 The Teaching of the Noble Ones
an10.179:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the teaching of the noble ones, and what is not the teaching of the noble ones. …
an10.179:4.2: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.
an10.179:4.3: And what is not the teaching of the noble ones?
an10.179:4.6: This is called what is not the teaching of the noble ones.
an10.179:5.1: And what is the teaching of the noble ones?
an10.179:5.4: This is called the teaching of the noble ones.”
